price: O you who believe, fear Allah and say what is right,
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَقُولُواْ قَوۡلٗا سَدِيدٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
